pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Foot Powder 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Foot Powder keeps feet dry and comfortable, reducing foot odour. Prevents excess moisture from forming on feet, and is talc free.
 

• Contains 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil

• Helps control foot odour from sweaty feet

• Contains corn starch to prevent excess moisture by absorbing perspiration, leaving feet dry and comfortable

 

In the 1970's Eric White pioneered Australia's Tea Tree Oil industry, realising his dream in the alternately floodwashed and drought-baked Bungawalbin wetlands of northern New South Wales. After many years of hard work, painstaking research and lobbying, a crown lease was granted. It arrived on a Thursday in 1976... and Thursday Plantation was born.

Size: 100g

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs.

Ingredients

Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Magnesium Carbonate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Fragrance, Citral, Limonene.

Directions

For external use only. Use daily on dry feet especially between toes. Sprinkle into shoes and socks for continued protection.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
